headline: Berenberg Upgrades Autodesk (ADSK) Stock to Buy from Hold
summary: Autodesk, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADSK) is one of the Top 10 AI and Technology Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On June 27, Berenberg upgraded the company’s stock to “Buy” from “Hold” with a price objective of $365, an increase from the prior target of $325, as reported by The Fly. The firm noted a compelling margin-expansion opportunity at Autodesk, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADSK). […]
